channel.title: Intro to the workshop on F5XC experience

item.title: Password Reset
item.description: If you reached this step you should already have received an email from F5XC requesting you to reset your password. Check you email inbox and follow the bellow steps.

item.title: Login
item.description: In order to access the F5XC platform you need to follow this link . Enter your email and new password. Some additional initial setup steps are required, follow the described bellow.
